settings.text: The installation of Cockpit React Static example website only requires a few steps:

settings.code:
# Clone repository
git clone git@github.com:pauloamgomes/CockpitCMS-React-Static.git
cd cockpitcms-react-static

# start Cockpit
cd cockpit
./install.sh

# start react app
cd ../react-app
yarn install
yarn start

settings.text: After the execution of above steps you are ready to access Cockpit on http://localhost:8088 (user: admin pass: admin) and the website on http://localhost:3000
